alert.note: Alert for Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 9:56AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tangipahoa, northwestern Washington Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southwestern Walthall Counties through 1030 AM CST... At 956 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Herman, or 8 miles northwest of Franklinton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tylertown and Mount Herman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
